Body:
I've read (can't find references) that computer translation software often use Lojban as an intermediate language. But if I know Lojban, why not to use it as a source for translation? So I write text in Lojban and automatically get clear translation to English, German, Russian, Chinese etc.

Is it overoptimistic idea, or do Lojban-to-natural-languages translation software exist and works well?
Title: Computer translation from Lojban to NN, does it work well?
